alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:31AM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Most of the accumulating snow will fall late today through early Tuesday. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, the Northern Foot Hills and the Northern Black Hills. In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
